q: Ben Smith: Mike Pence 's mom says he'll announce plans tomorrow Indiana Rep. Mike Pence 's mother tells the National Journal that he'll announce a decision on his his political future tomorrow: Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., is set to announce a decision on his political future on Friday, according to his mother, who has been urging him to finally put an end to all of the building speculation over his political future. "He will be making his announcement tomorrow," said Nancy Mike Pence Fritsch, contacted today by telephone at her home in Columbus, Ind. Asked to confirm reports that she has told her son to

which he resigned after a reporter and a private investigator were imprisoned for phone-tapping in 2007. In appointing Andy Coulson , David Cameron judged his experience and skills outweighed the political risk that the phone-tapping scandal might resurface. The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. He's now done the right thing but he should have done it earlier, Labour leader Ed Miliband told reporters. "I think it raises real questions about David Cameron 's judgment that he hung on to Andy Coulson for so long." Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. is also in the spotlight as

The moves are part of Google Inc. 's plans to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. The changes will be effective on April 4. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, said Eric Schmidt . Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin . However, he will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought

Simon Cowell was the voice of the people, he says. "He had a very specific skill that not everyone can pull off. Even Ellen DeGeneres , who has been an Oscar host couldn't do it- and that was a shock to me."

I think that might be the easiest game I ever played in my career. I was out there watching, Allen Iverson hollered across the locker room after Carmelo Anthony scored a career-high 49 points to lead the Denver Nuggets past the Washington Wizards 111-100 Friday night.
